GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "Thyroid Decision Aid".

Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: Welcome [dem_name]

Question.TranslatedText: We will do 3 things together today Provide you with useful information about Thyroid cancer and options for treatment Ask some questions about which medical goals are most important to you Provide you insight into the medical options for Thyroid cancer that best meet your goals
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
We will do 3 things together today

  • Provide you with useful information about Thyroid cancer and options for treatment
  • Ask some questions about which medical goals are most important to you
  • Provide you insight into the medical options for Thyroid cancer that best meet your goals

Question.TranslatedText: Information about Thyroid Cancer for [dem_name] Thyroid cancer is common, but treatable Fewer than 1 person in 1000 die from thyroid cancer There are many reasonable choices for you
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Information about Thyroid Cancer for [dem_name]

  • Thyroid cancer is common, but treatable
  • Fewer than 1 person in 1000 die from thyroid cancer
  • There are many reasonable choices for you
About your Bethesda Classification

Question.TranslatedText: [dem_name], your Bethesda Classification [dem_bethesda] tells us: Your cancer risk is 1% to 4% There are a number of good treatment options we will explore
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
[dem_name], your Bethesda Classification [dem_bethesda] tells us:

  • Your cancer risk is 1% to 4%
  • There are a number of good treatment options we will explore

Question.TranslatedText: [dem_name], your Bethesda Classification [dem_bethesda] tells us: Your cancer risk is 0% to 3% There are a number of good treatment options we will explore
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
[dem_name], your Bethesda Classification [dem_bethesda] tells us:

  • Your cancer risk is 0% to 3%
  • There are a number of good treatment options we will explore

Question.TranslatedText: [dem_name], your Bethesda Classification [dem_bethesda] tells us: Your cancer risk is 5% to 15% There are a number of good treatment options we will explore

  • There are a number of good treatment options we will explore

[dem_name], your Bethesda Classification [dem_bethesda] tells us:

  • There are a number of good treatment options we will explore

Question.TranslatedText: Bethesda Case III, IV, V & Afirma
Has Adjusted Cancer Risk (based on Molecular Testing)
Has Adjusted Afirma Cancer Risk (used for branching logic)
Has Adjusted Thyroseq Cancer Risk (used for branching logic)

ItemDef.Name: w4_risk_afirma

Question.TranslatedText: [dem_name], your afirma results tell us: Because you have both FNA (Fine Needle Aspiration) and Molecular Testing (afirma) an adjustment to your cancer risk is warranted. Your adjusted cancer risk is [w4_risk_afirma]%
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
[dem_name], your afirma results tell us:

  • Because you have both FNA (Fine Needle Aspiration) and Molecular Testing (afirma) an adjustment to your cancer risk is warranted.
  • Your adjusted cancer risk is [w4_risk_afirma]%

Question.TranslatedText: [dem_name], your thyroseq results tell us: Because you have both FNA (Fine Needle Aspiration) and Molecular Testing (thyroseq) an adjustment to your cancer risk is warranted. Your adjusted cancer risk is [w4_risk_thyroseq]%
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
[dem_name], your thyroseq results tell us:

  • Because you have both FNA (Fine Needle Aspiration) and Molecular Testing (thyroseq) an adjustment to your cancer risk is warranted.
  • Your adjusted cancer risk is [w4_risk_thyroseq]%

Question.TranslatedText: [dem_name], please click "Next Page" to explore your treatment options.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText: [dem_name], please click "Next Page" to explore your treatment options.

Question.TranslatedText: [dem_name], your treatment options are: Observation: Keep close tabs on the condition, prepared to make another judgment if the time comes. Hemi-Thyroidectomy: Removal of half the thyroid. Total Thyroidectomy: Removal of the entire thyroid.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
[dem_name], your treatment options are:

 

  • Observation: Keep close tabs on the condition, prepared to make another judgment if the time comes.
  • Hemi-Thyroidectomy: Removal of half the thyroid.
  • Total Thyroidectomy: Removal of the entire thyroid.

Question.TranslatedText:
[dem_name], those treatment options may have implications such as: Scar: The different options have differing scarring effects. Low Calcium: Some options could require you to take a calcium supplement. Voice Complications: Some options could affect your voice. Need for Medication: Some options may require lifelong medication. Recovery: Some options have longer recovery times.
Let's explore these different treatments and their implications.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
[dem_name], those treatment options may have implications such as:

 

  • Scar: The different options have differing scarring effects.
  • Low Calcium: Some options could require you to take a calcium supplement.
  • Voice Complications: Some options could affect your voice.
  • Need for Medication: Some options may require lifelong medication.
  • Recovery: Some options have longer recovery times.

    Let's explore these different treatments and their implications.

Question.TranslatedText: Concerns about Scarring Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy No concerns 3-4cm scar 4-5cm scar
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Concerns about Scarring

Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy
No concerns 3-4cm scar 4-5cm scar

Question.TranslatedText: Concerns about Low Calcium Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy No concerns No concerns Temporary for 20 people in 100. Permanent for ~1-5 people in 100.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Concerns about Low Calcium

Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy
No concerns No concerns Temporary for 20 people in 100.
    Permanent for ~1-5 people in 100.

Question.TranslatedText: Concerns about Voice Complications Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy No concerns Temporary for 10 people in 100. Temporary for 20 people in 100. Permanent for ~1-5 people in 100. Permanent for ~1-5 people in 100.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Concerns about Voice Complications

Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy
No concerns Temporary for 10 people in 100. Temporary for 20 people in 100.
  Permanent for ~1-5 people in 100. Permanent for ~1-5 people in 100.

Question.TranslatedText: Concerns about Need For Medication Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy No concerns Thyroid supplementation required for ~30 people in 100. Thyroid supplementation required.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Concerns about Need For Medication

Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy
No concerns Thyroid supplementation required for ~30 people in 100. Thyroid supplementation required.

Question.TranslatedText: Concerns about Recovery Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy No concerns Same day surgery or one night in hospital Same day surgery or one night in hospital
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Concerns about Recovery

Observation Hemi-Thyroidectomy Total Thyroidectomy
No concerns Same day surgery or one night in hospital Same day surgery or one night in hospital
We are in this together.

Question.TranslatedText: Trade-off considerations for [dem_name] We will consider the following trade-offs associated with observation, hemi-thyroidectomy, and total thyroidectomy. You can help us guide your care by telling us which considerations matter most to you
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Trade-off considerations for [dem_name]

 

We will consider the following trade-offs associated with observation, hemi-thyroidectomy, and total thyroidectomy.


You can help us guide your care by telling us which considerations matter most to you

Question.TranslatedText:
[dem_name], based on your answers to our questions, the options best aligned (in order) to your healthcare goals include:
Best Aligned: Total Thyroidectomy
Somewhat Aligned: Hemi-Thyroidectomy
Least Aligned: Observation
